alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 10:26PM CDT until June 09 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Gosper County in south central Nebraska... Northern Furnas County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1026 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 26 miles southeast of Curtis, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Holbrook around 1040 PM CDT. Arapahoe around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Edison and Hollinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
